tool_description: MegaRouletteAPI is a real-time API that provides developers with a way to integrate  live data into their applications.This API is designed to be fast, reliable, and easy to use,  allowing developers to quickly and easily access real-time Megaroulette game outcome data so they can integrate in any strategy
name: MegarouletteAPI
title: MegarouletteAPI

api_list.name: History
api_list.description: History by default latest 100 spins .you can modify the size

api_list.name: Latest Outcome
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://megarouletteapi.p.rapidapi.com/latest-outcome"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "megarouletteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://megarouletteapi.p.rapidapi.com/latest-outcome"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "megarouletteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
